I was wondering if there is a way to restart zulip container automatically after system gets reboot.
Can I put restart: always in compose.yml config file to make sure zulip container is always running after system gets reboot?
Thank you so much. :)
@jcheng just to be clear, is the question how to configure Docker to automatically start the Zulip container image on boot when using docker-zulip?

Everything is working now. Thank you. :)
